snippet: Last week, we looked at near-miss word choices. This week, a round-up of homophone problems, many of them familiar by now. Put them on your list — and look them up every time if you need to.
abstract: Last week, we looked at near-miss word choices. This week, a round-up of homophone problems, many of them familiar by now. Put them on your list — and look them up every time if you need to.
